pr_title: GEODE-7920: Geode UDP INT thread found processing cache operations

timeline.message:
GEODE-7920: Geode UDP INT thread found processing cache operations

Modified DistributionMessage to look for JGroups "internal" executor
threads.  We thought we'd turned off all JGroups thread pools but this
one is still around.  We don't want to process DistributionMessages in
these threads unless absolutely necessary since they're needed when
processing incoming messages.

timeline.bodyText: the old name was very creative, but a bit subjective... like the rename
timeline.author: echobravopapa

timeline.bodyText: looks like some dead code cruft ... maybe we scrape it off while we're nearby
timeline.author: echobravopapa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,7 +79,7 @@ protected void process(final ClusterDistributionManager dm) {
     // reply.setRecipient(getSender());

timeline.bodyText: is/was there a failing test that caught the underlying issue?
timeline.author: echobravopapa

replies.bodyText: No, this was in thread dumps when I was debugging an application with disable-tcp=true.
replies.author: bschuchardt
